title: Codex Obscura
description: Jonkil Calembour returns to take posession of a mysterious manuscript written by a sanatarium in-patient, attempts to graft a theory of painting, and becomes locked in a zone where it is perpetually 3:33 am while cocaine-addled inventors try to woo the State Defense with war machine proposals. Includes glossary of neologisms and an introduction by acclaimed author, Raymond Federman.
author: Kane X. Faucher
